code: import React from'react';import'./styles.scss';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Projects=()=>{const projects=[{title:'Perhitungan Pohon Pinus Otomatis (YOLOv8)',description:'Sistem deteksi dan perhitungan otomatis pohon pinus menggunakan model YOLOv8 dan data foto udara drone.
